title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H2 - Mar 12 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H2 - Mar 12 2022
description:
Biden bans Russian oil and gas. Stephen Colbert (who Buck reminds us is worth close to $100 million) says he'll pay $15 a gallon for gas. C&B remind that this is quite different for the average American's budget and if they have to stop buying pizza for their kids. Biden uses Ukraine crisis to push green energy. Poll: Majority of Dems wouldn't fight invasion of America. Clay says: "I think what is alarming is we are aging out of people who are true patriots." UFC fighter Bryce Mitchell says he wouldn't go fight for Ukraine overseas, but passionately describes how he would fight for America at home. You know things are bad when SNL mocks Kamala Harris.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Biden bans Russian oil and gas. Stephen Colbert (who Buck reminds us is worth close to $100 million) says he'll pay $15 a gallon for gas. C&B remind that this is quite different for the average American's budget and if they have to stop buying pizza for their kids. Biden uses Ukraine crisis to push green energy. Poll: Majority of Dems wouldn't fight invasion of America. Clay says: "I think what is alarming is we are aging out of people who are true patriots." UFC fighter Bryce Mitchell says he wouldn't go fight for Ukraine overseas, but passionately describes how he would fight for America at home. You know things are bad when SNL mocks Kamala Harris.
